MH = Fragile X Syndrome

ENTRY = FRAXA Syndrome|T047|NON|EQV|NLM (2003)|030902|abcdef
ENTRY = FXS|T047|NON|EQV|UNK (2019)|991231|abcdef
ENTRY = Fra(X) Syndrome|T047|NON|EQV|NLM (1992)|920101|abcdef
ENTRY = Martin-Bell Syndrome|T047|NON|EQV|NLM (1992)|920101|abcdef
ENTRY = Marker X Syndrome|T047|NON|EQV|NLM (1992)|920101|abcdef
MN = C10.597.606.360.320.322
MN = C16.320.322
MN = C16.320.180.260
FX = FMR1 protein
ST = T047
AN = do not confuse with FRAGILE X CHROMOSOME; coordinate IM with specific manifestation (IM)
PI = Chromosomes, Human, Pair 23 (1966-1990)
PI = Mental Retardation, X-Linked (1981-1990)
PI = X Chromosome (1975-1990)
MS = A condition characterized genetically by a TRINUCLEOTIDE REPEAT EXPANSION of CGG repeats in the FMR1 GENE region, and clinically by intellectual disability, HYPERKINESIS, SEIZURES, language delay, and enlargement of the ears and testes. The degree of intellectual disability varies from mild to severe. It is the most common form of inherited intellectual disability, and is associated with expansion and silencing of the FMR1 gene on the X CHROMOSOME.
UI = D005600
MR = 20230711
DA = 19910101
DC = 1
DX = 19910101
